itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, February 14, 2013
description: On this Valentine's Day, American Airlines and US Airways are making a wedding announcement as the boards of both carriers have approved a merger. Bob Crandall, the former CEO of American Airlines, joins us to discuss what's ahead for what will be the world's largest airline. Is a new global recession on the way? And, despite advice to the contrary, work colleagues frequently date each other. That can give HR a headache and lead to corporate policies barring office romance.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, February 14, 2013
byline: Stacey Vanek Smith, Jim Burress, Jeremy Hobson, David Brancaccio, Sam Beard, Tracey Samuelson, Janell Burley Hofmann and Chris Farrell
